comment: Professor is very passionate about architecture and a genious. However, he does pick his favorites and even if you miss most of the classes and don't show a lot of work you will pass. He is interesting to listen to and funny but if you show up to every class and try but he doesn't like your work don't count on passing.
Passionate about the subjects, and quite organized in presentation.  Interesting lectures. Essays round out lectures.Tests directly from material.

Prof Rizzuto is one of the best teachers I have had the pleasure of learning from. I have taken every class of his since my first year in the architecture program and I leave each semester with more knowledge than I got in. He is very dedicated to his work and he is also funny and cool

He is one of the most intelligent professors I have ever had. He definitely knows his material and he knows how to relay it to his classes. He does have interesting, but long and elaborate lectures, but if you take good notes and try to start studying more than one day before the test you will do well in his course.
